objectArray.name: Dust Rise
objectArray.flavor_text:
[Before selecting an action on Turn 1 and Turn 4 counting from the start of battle]
Grants all surviving allies and all enemies Attack Boost (1x) (large effect/1 turn(s)).

objectArray.name: Dust Rise
objectArray.flavor_text:
[Before selecting an action on certain turns counting from the start of battle (Turn 1/every 3 turns after Turn 1)]
Grants all surviving allies and all enemies Attack Boost (1x) (large effect/1 turn(s)).

objectArray.name: ATK Boost at Full HP
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
When HP is full, increases damage dealt.

objectArray.name: ATK Boost at Non-Full HP
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
When HP is not full, increases damage dealt.

objectArray.name: ATK Boost on Specific Turns
objectArray.flavor_text: Before selecting commands on certain turns counting from the start of round (Turn 3/every 3 turns after Turn 3), grants all surviving allies <special_effect=800000539>[Challenge Rule] ATK Boost</special_effect> (1 turn(s)).

objectArray.name: OverDrive Attack Boost
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
Increases damage dealt by OverDrive attacks.

objectArray.name: Direct Attack Boost
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
Increases damage dealt by direct attacks.

objectArray.name: Spell Attack Boost
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
Increases damage dealt by spell attacks.

objectArray.name: Skill Attack Boost
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
Increases skill attacks' damage.

objectArray.name: Defense Down When Attacked
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Enemies]
When attacked, grants oneself [Challenge Rule] Defense Down (2 turn(s)).
*Only activates when hit by an attack.

objectArray.name: ATK Boost When Attacked
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
When attacked, grants oneself [Challenge Rule] ATK Boost (2 turn(s)).
*Only activates when hit by an attack.

objectArray.name: Recover BP When Attacked
objectArray.flavor_text:
[All Surviving Allies]
When attacked, recovers own BP (+2).
*Only activates when hit by an attack.

objectArray.name: Battle Nourishment: Attack
objectArray.flavor_text:
[Before selecting an action every turn]
Grants all surviving allies [Score Challenge] Attack Boost (1 turn(s)).

objectArray.name: Battle Nourishment: Defense
objectArray.flavor_text:
[Before selecting an action every turn]
Grants all enemies [Score Challenge] Attack Down (1 turn(s)).

objectArray.name: Battle Nourishment: Special
objectArray.flavor_text:
[Battle Start/End of Turn]
Recovers all surviving allies' BP (+10).

[Before selecting an action every turn]
Increases all surviving allies' STR/DEX/AGI/INT.

objectArray.name: Ice Prison
objectArray.flavor_text:
[At the end of Turn 3 counting from the start of battle]
Grants all surviving allies BP Cost Increase (Increase: 1/Effect: permanent in battle).

objectArray.name: Life Cycle
objectArray.flavor_text:
[End of Turn]
Recovers a portion of all surviving allies' HP (5% of target's Max HP).

objectArray.name: Hell Fire
objectArray.flavor_text:
[End of Turn]
All surviving allies take a portion of damage (5% of target's Max HP).
*Proportional Damage can't be reduced by effects that reduce damage taken.

objectArray.name: Oracle
objectArray.flavor_text:
[At the end of even turns counting from the start of battle]
Grants all surviving allies Max BP Reduction (Reduction: 1/Effect: permanent in battle).

objectArray.name: Ice Prison
objectArray.flavor_text:
[At the end of certain turns counting from the start of battle (Turn 4/every 6 turns after Turn 4)]
Grants all surviving allies BP Cost Increase (Increase: 1/Effect: permanent in battle).

objectArray.name: Life Cycle
objectArray.flavor_text:
[End of Turn]
Recovers a portion of all surviving allies' and all enemies' HP (5% of target's Max HP).

objectArray.name: BP Cost Reduction on Specific Turns
objectArray.flavor_text:
[On every 3 turns counting from the start of round]
All surviving allies' skill/spell BP cost is reduced to 0.
*Warriors who returned from unconsciousness at the end of the previous turn are not included.

objectArray.name: BP Cost Reduction (Stack) on Specific Turns
objectArray.flavor_text: At the end of certain turns counting from the start of round (Turn 2/every 2 turns after Turn 2), grants all surviving allies <special_effect=800000567>[Challenge Rule] BP Cost Reduction</special_effect> (Reduction: 1/Effect: permanent in battle) (Max times: 20 times per round).

objectArray.name: OD Gauge Up Every Turn
objectArray.flavor_text:
[End of turn]
Increases all surviving allies' OD gauges (extreme effect).

objectArray.name: Recover HP Every Turn
objectArray.flavor_text:
[End of Turn]
Recovers a portion of all surviving allies' HP (30% of target's Max HP).
